response.job_title: English Professor at Fundación Universitaria Juan N. Corpas - UniCorpas
response.summary:
Passionate and dedicated TESOL-Certified teacher with excellent communicative skills and skilled in the design and execution of practical activities for the encouragement of individual and collective learning. Highly adaptable professional with a commitment to all aspects of student learning and the promotion of growth.
Versatile and with the ability to adapt to different styles and methods of teaching and learning of students.
response.skills: Lesson Planning, English as a Second Language (ESL), Inglés, Translation, Creative Writing, Storytelling, Public Speaking, Business English, Conversation Clubs, English for Specific Purposes

company.name: Fundación Universitaria Juan N. Corpas - UniCorpas

profile_positions.company: Fundación Universitaria Juan N. Corpas - UniCorpas
profile_positions.description:
Planned and executed General English classes for the students of the Medicine and Nursing Bachelor Degrees of the institution.
Prioritized the creation of safe and welcoming spaces to enhance student participation and productive class discussions.
profile_positions.title: English Professor

profile_positions.description:
Hosting the weekly Tesla's English Conversation Club (In-person and online sessions). 
Advised students and participants with different levels of proficiency on tools, techniques, and suggestions to enhance their English learning process.
profile_positions.title: English Conversation Teacher

profile_positions.description: Personalized individual and group English lessons: Business English, English for Specific Purposes, English for developers, English for Academic Purposes.
profile_positions.title: English Tutor

profile_positions.description:
Planned and hosted English Conversation Clubs.
Assisted and tutored students with various assignments and exam preparations to strengthen and support their English skills.
Assisted professors of the PLE (Second Language Program) on the development of their lessons by planning and coordinating workshops and communicative activities.
profile_positions.title: English Academic Tutor

profile_positions.description:
Provided optimal instruction and academic support to teenage and adult students following the institution's Direct Method.
Facilitated personalized and innovative learning experiences and hands-on learning by planning and developing workshops, tutorials and interactive activities.
profile_positions.title: English Teacher

profile_positions.description:
Planned and hosted English Conversation Clubs.
Assisted and tutored students with various assignments and exam preparations to strengthen and support their English skills.
Assisted professors of the PLE (Second Language Program) on the development of their lessons by planning and coordinating workshops and communicative activities.
profile_positions.title: English Academic Tutor
